sense.def:
A brand of a product
je različica izdelka, ki jo proizvaja določen izdelovalec.

seg.quote: ...a preference for one brand of soft drink rather than another.

sense.def:
A brand of a kind of thought, behaviour, or writing
je posebna vrsta mišljenja, vedênja ali pisanja.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
COMPLEMENT
or
‘as’

sense.def:
To be branded as something bad
pomeni, da ljudje glede nekoga presodijo, da je slab, in potem tako o njem govorijo.

seg.quote: His political supporters had been branded traitors.
Hamburgers have been branded as junk food.

sense.def:
Kadar je žival
branded
, v njeno kožo vžgejo trajno znamenje in tako označijo, kdo je njen lastnik.
